messages.content: What is the purpose of the ComfyUI_merge ASVL node?
The ComfyUI_merge ASVL node is used to connect images. It allows users to combine two or more images, depending on the specified option (vertical or horizontal assignment rule).
How does the ComftyUI_merge ASVL node support image connection?
The ComftyUI_merge ASVL node supports image connection by allowing users to select either a vertical or horizontal assignment rule.
Does the ComftyUI_merge ASVL node have a limitation on the number of images it can connect?
The ComftyUI_merge ASVL node can connect two images at a time but can be used repeatedly to connect multiple images.
What are the supported image size conditions for the ComftyUI_merge ASVL node?
The ComftyUI_merge ASVL node supports connecting images that have the same size since it uses the vertical and horizontal assignment rules based on the size consistency.
How can a user specify the type of connection for images using the ComftyUI_merge ASVL node?
Users can specify the type of connection for images using the ComftyUI_merge ASVL node by selecting either horizontal or vertical assignment rule in the parameters.
Can a user manually input images' horizontal position in the ComftyUI_merge ASVL node?
The ComftyUI_merge ASVL node does not support manual input of images' horizontal position. The node uses the option of filling in a horizontal assignment rule.
Explain the effect of the fill value in the ComftyUI_merge ASVL node.

The fill value in the ComftyUI_merge ASVL node determines the transparency of custom nodes that extend ComftyUI's functionality. A values of 0 will result in fully opaque nodes, while values outside the range of 0 and 1 won't display any replaces. Values between 0 and 1 will display an irregular shape that typically is opaque more toward the nodes visibility
